Text: If you feel grateful that I was uploading these DVD's at The Pirate Bay, wanted to ask a help from you that is American and his mother tongue is English, I'll explain: I am Brazilian and wanted someone America could help produce subtitles this seminar in English, and once this is done, sync them and pass me (thiago@hotmail.co.in - MSN - contact email) so I could catch this legend in English and pass it to the Portuguese, the people you read this, be willing to help me?
Eu posso traduzir de Ingles para Portugues. Como que eu mando mensagem pra vc? E minha primeira vez com uma conta nesse site. Falow.
